name: A Memory of Mazes
description:
NOTE: This is a submission for Weekly Game Jam 147. The theme was "Invisible", hence why the player can't see what is directly around them for the maze.

A Memory of Mazes
Chill out, relax, and play some maze levels, with a total of 10. Go to the yellow blocks to unblock some pathway. There are some timing blocks that will go off and on at a 1 second interval.

Instructions
WASD or Arrow keys to move. Press ESC to pause and go to the menu.

All work done by me, Gregory Weber.
